Topic.Title: Can anyone recommend some really good Horror Text Adventures?

Posts.EditableText: Looking to to get stuck into some games that will scare the crap out of me, any suggestions?
Posts.HTML: Looking to to get stuck into some games that will scare the crap out of me, any suggestions?

Posts.EditableText:
I don't know if this is scary, because I am easily scared, myself. It is my own scary game.
https://textadventures.co.uk/games/view/odwotgjlq0cyj6awt_mfia/other-worlds-near

Posts.EditableText:
Of course I’m privy to my game:

https://textadventures.co.uk/games/view/otwghen-rugkm8qcg7pita/good-night

Make sure you read description.  It’s not so much a puzzle game as it is a story.  Short.  Listen with headphones, on laptop/desktop, and in the dark.
